hadiths.text: Narrated Buraydah ibn al-Hasib: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: to Ali: Do not give a second look, Ali, (because) while you are not to blame for the first, you have no right to the second

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُؤْمَرُ بِهِ مِنْ غَضِّ الْبَصَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Command To Lower The Gaze
